attributes.action: free Stephen Gough and revise the law by which he is currently being detained.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: those who sign this petition are in agreement that any law which imprisons a man such as stephen gough for refusing to wear clothes is in need of ammendment. in light of this belief we contend that stephen gough is unjustly behind bars and call for his immediate release.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
